title: QuickStart Guide for ManageIQ with Red Hat OpenStack Platform
QuickStart Guide for ManageIQ with Red Hat OpenStack Platform
subtitle: Getting started with ManageIQ on Red Hat OpenStack Platform

abstract.para: This document provides a quick guide for integrating an Red Hat OpenStack Platform cloud deployment with ManageIQ. It is intended as an abridged reference for users already familiar with ManageIQ, Red Hat OpenStack Platform, and Red Hat Enterprise Linux.
